20110111150658.000|20110111150659.000|CC1|>> LET ME JUST START WITH A

20110111150700.000|20110111150702.000|CC1|GIFFORDS OVERNIGHT?             
20110111150702.000|20110111150705.000|CC1|>> NO, THERE IS NO CHANGE.      
20110111150705.000|20110111150706.000|CC1|AND AS FRUSTRATING AS THAT MAY  
20110111150706.000|20110111150710.000|CC1|SOUND, THAT'S A GOOD THING.

20110111150711.000|20110111150712.000|CC1|REID HAS ALSO SAID THIS OVER THE
20110111150712.000|20110111150713.000|CC1|LAST COUPLE OF DAYS, I BELIEVE I
20110111150713.000|20110111150715.000|CC1|FIRST HEARD YOU SAY IT ON       
20110111150715.000|20110111150716.000|CC1|SUNDAY, THAT WHEN IT COMES TO   
20110111150716.000|20110111150719.000|CC1|SWELLING AFTER A BRAIN INJURY OR
20110111150719.000|20110111150720.000|CC1|A BRAIN TRAUMA LIKE THE ONE THAT
20110111150720.000|20110111150725.000|CC1|CONGRESSWOMAN GIFFORDS HAS      
20110111150725.000|20110111150725.000|CC1|UNDERGONE, THAT THE SWELLING    
20110111150725.000|20110111150728.000|CC1|TENDS TO PEAK ON OR ABOUT DAY   
20110111150728.000|20110111150728.000|CC1|THREE.                          
20110111150728.000|20110111150729.000|CC1|THAT WOULD MAKE TODAY A VERY    
20110111150729.000|20110111150731.000|CC1|IMPORTANT DAY IN HER CONDITION. 
20110111150731.000|20110111150732.000|CC1|SO, IN TERMS OF SWELLING AROUND 
20110111150732.000|20110111150732.000|CC1|THE AREA OF THE GUNSHOT WOUND,  
20110111150732.000|20110111150738.000|CC1|WHAT CAN YOU TELL ME?           
20110111150738.000|20110111150739.000|CC1|>> THE C.A.T. SCAN THIS MORNING 
20110111150739.000|20110111150744.000|CC1|DOESN'T SHOW ANY SWELLING THIS  
20110111150744.000|20110111150746.000|CC1|MORNING, AND THAT'S GOOD.
